Articles.Content:
Presenting the largest plane I have ever made, the B1B lancer. Featuring 3 dimensional accuracy this 500 part beast is held aloft through many clipped engines and the glorious economic power of capitalism. If you would like to experience the raw power of this monstrosity you can [download it here](https://www.dropbox.com/s/w16ocwwwbkzi0bh/B1B%20Lancer.craft?dl=0)

<iframe width="640" height="480" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>![0xFDQe1.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/0xFDQe1.png?1)![QDyh52O.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/QDyh52O.png?1)

![epIMOha.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/epIMOha.jpg)

![VWBp5Uu.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/VWBp5Uu.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-19T19:15:42Z" title="07/19/2015 07:15  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 19, 2015</time> by landfish2**

stats? Who cares.... any over designed, over powered and over hyped beast has GOT to be good...

![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Nice! Stats?

500 parts

something like 400 tonnes (i think)

twr of about 0.8

> 
> stats? Who cares.... any over designed, over powered and over hyped beast has GOT to be good...
> ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

The economic strength of capitalism is never over hyped
Clipped engines and capitalism? That gets the job done!

Good god, this is fantastic.

Capitalism FTW.

> 
> Good god, this is fantastic.
> Capitalism FTW.

indeed as shown through this physical analogy, capitalism is the superior financial structure

This is awesome, my dad says the B-1B is the prettiest plane he's ever seen. I'll try it, hopefully it doesn't lag too bad ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Now available is a working infernal robotics swing wing version of the Lancer, with fully rotatable wings, downloadable [here](https://www.dropbox.com/s/3t5kz0ntob847da/B1B%20lancer%20infernal%20robotics.craft?dl=0). (kerbal joint reinforcement REALLY needed for this one)(press 1/2 to move wings)

![3U8b6kP.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/3U8b6kP.jpg)
I really love this thing. Nice job.
